description: Execute the entire Ansible role imperatively

npm_config_unsafe_perm.description: set explicitly to false, then installing as a non-root user will fail.

nodejs_npm_global_packages.description: Define a list of global packages to be installed with NPM.

nodejs_package_json_path.description: The path of a package.json file used to install packages globally.

nodejs_generate_etc_profile.description: Set to false if you need to handle this manually with a per-user install.

par_tags.description: An array of Ansible tags to execute (optional)

par_skip_tags.description: An array of Ansible tags to skip (optional)

par_start_at_task.description: The name of the task to start execution at (optional)

par_limit.description: Limit playbook execution to specific hosts (optional)

par_timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for playbook execution (optional)

par_user.description: Remote user to use for Ansible connections (optional)

par_env_vars.description: Additional environment variables for ansible-playbook execution (optional)
